author: James Freeman
title: Obama and the Art of the Iran Deal
text:
President Obama always said that his nuclear agreement with Tehran wouldnâ€™t solve all the problems with the Iranian regime, and he certainly was right about that. It appears that for essentially the entire period of the negotiation, drafting and implementation of the accord by the Obama administration, Iran was simultaneously conducting a significant campaign to steal American property.
